title: Cannondale Overhauls Their Synapse Neo Road e-Bike, Adds Allroad Option
content:
Cannondale's newest road e-bike receives a lightweight Bosch Class 3 motor and a carbon frame derived from the Synapse road bike.

Read the full article at Cannondale Overhauls Their Synapse Neo Road e-Bike, Adds Allroad Option on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
